snippet.title: Playing Every Apple II Floppy, E72 | Twerps
snippet.description:
Taking a quick look at Twerps, a 1981 release for the Apple II.

This is episode 72 of Woz A Day, my series where I'm taking a look at Apple II software in the "WOZ" disk image format uploaded to the Internet Archive "Woz A Day" collection in upload order: https://archive.org/details/wozaday
These are preservation-quality unmodified/uncracked disk images that can pass copy-protection checks and preserve the original "retail" experience.

📋 Woz A Day Playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLXVtlqgyC7v2ACowTpMXcMrLbfX1qdBHE
💾 Download disk image or play in-browser: https://archive.org/details/wozaday_Twerps

Note: the 1982 date I was looking at was from MobyGames, and is possibly just incorrect.
